---
title: "Table 3 - Top 10 NCI Catchment areas"
format: html
---
  
```{r}
library(CensusHLA)
```


```{r}
# This takes time. ~10-15 minutes as it goes state by state by tract
# Currently needs to be run in CensusHLA working directory too because it requires the catchment area shapefile.
a11_catchment <- summarize_tract_genotypic_frequencies_by_delNero2022_catchment(query_allele = 'A*11:01')
a11_catchment_summed |> dplyr::arrange(desc(total_2020_pop))
```
